# VSUserAccount.AccountType

**Enumeration**

Constants that represent whether a user has access to paid content.

## Declaration

```swift
enum AccountType
```

## Overview

The default is [doc://com.apple.videosubscriberaccount/documentation/VideoSubscriberAccount/VSUserAccount-swift.struct/AccountType-swift.enum/free].

## Account types

- **VSUserAccount.AccountType.free**: A constant that indicates a user has access to free content.
- **VSUserAccount.AccountType.paid**: A constant that indicate a user has access to paid content.

## Creating user accounts

- **init(accountType:updateURL:)**: Creates a user account object with a URL for account update requests.

## Conforms To

- Copyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
